message: Route 12 diverted. Stops: FLORIDA@FARROW, FLORIDA@WMCLEMORE, FLORIDA@MCLEMORE, FLORIDA@COLORADO, FLORIDA@DESOTO, FLORIDA@CRUMP, FLORIDA@VIRGINIA, FLORIDA@GEORGIA, FRONT@FARMERS MARKET, CENTRAL STATION, will not be served.
